content: Quote from: aoluain on December 18, 2022, 12:21:05 PMQuote from: aoluain on August 27, 2022, 12:39:48 PMI HAVE 6 4 3 PRINTS, THESE WERE THE FIRST PRINTS OF THE BITCOIN COLOURING BOOK OFF THE PRESS WHICH WERE ERROR'SThe machine was set to print back to back! The operator reset the machine and started again.The item is stamped, dated and signedSales of the actual book are on THIS thread Â I am approaching the end of the BCB error prints and I am offering numbers 4 and 5 of 6 onlyto the community as per the previous ones FREE.50 tickets up for grabs, 1 per person >>>>> PLEASE PICK YOUR NUMBER, I'm NOT DOING IT FOR YOU / RANDOM REQUESTS WILL BE IGNORED <<<<<No New accounts accepted registered after 1/12/2022There is only to be 1 winner only claiming both error printsWinner will be decided by the blockchain . . . as usualI also forgot to mention there will be a few limited edition BCB stickers included with the prints.Quote from: aoluain on December 18, 2022, 12:21:05 PM
